meanings.sent1: The undisciplined child kept interrupting the teacher during class.
meanings.sent2: She missed her deadlines because of her undisciplined work habits.
meanings.sent3: The undisciplined puppy chewed on everything in the house.
meanings.sent4: His undisciplined spending led to financial troubles.
meanings.sent5: The undisciplined behavior at the party caused chaos.

meanings.sent1: The undisciplined driver ignored the stop sign.
meanings.sent2: The undisciplined student constantly broke the school's dress code.
meanings.sent3: The undisciplined cat sneaked into places it wasn't allowed.
meanings.sent4: Her undisciplined approach to taxes resulted in penalties.
meanings.sent5: The undisciplined employee was always late for work.

meanings.sent1: The undisciplined crowd caused a disturbance at the event.
meanings.sent3: The undisciplined squirrel kept stealing bird food from the feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her undisciplined cat scratched the furniture despite training.
meanings.sent5: The undisciplined behavior of the team led to their defeat.
